component.description: Tree is is used for displaying hierarchical data and creating site navigations.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
value false java.lang.Object A TreeNode instance as the backing model. true
var false java.lang.String Name of the request-scoped variable that'll be used to refer each treenode data during rendering. true
dynamic false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies the ajax/client toggleMode. Default is false.
cache false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies caching on dynamically loaded nodes. When set to true expanded nodes will be kept in memory. Default is true.
onNodeClick false java.lang.String Javascript event to process when a tree node is clicked.
selection false java.lang.Object TreeNode array to reference the selections.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container element of tree.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container element of tree.
selectionMode false java.lang.String Defines the selectionMode.
highlight false java.lang.Boolean true Highlights nodes on hover when selection is enabled, set to false to disable highlighting.
datakey false java.lang.Object Unique key of the data presented by tree nodes.
